descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]ECE version uploaded ![/size]

[/color][/b]
[size=4]It might be possible to turn my presets into followers through [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54509/?]Familiar Faces[/url] mod by Verteiron if you want to ![/size]

Hello there ! 

Here is my second preset for you, guys ! Actually, I want to make a preset for each non-beast race and I want to share it with you !

[color=#00ffff][size=3]Let me know which race you want to see next time ![/size]  [/color]

The first preset was [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60803/?]Aenn The Fierce Nord Fighter[/url] and now here come Siam The Redguard Sword Dancer ! 

[b]The required mods remain the same : 

[/b]- [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] 
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] by expired6978
- SG Hair Pack 268 by HelloSanta
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The eyes of beauty[/url]  (Elves Edition) by LogRaam
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20483/?@]Women of Skyrim - enhanced female normalmaps[/url] by zzjay
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin textures V2 Beta[/url] by Maevan2
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile in HD[/url] by zzjay
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/?]Battle hardened warpaints[/url] by Diethardt [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/?]


[/url][b]Installation :[/b] Drop the file in your Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets\, however it's a "[b]1.slot[/b]" file so [i][b]check your presets to not overwrite it[/b][/i] ! 


Your screenshots are welcome ! 

Enjoy ! 

Quorr.
author: Quorr
